result.title: Welcome Message
result.content:
Hi all,

Welcome to our group: "Coding Enthusiast!"

We are a group of enthusiastic coders who would like to climb up to the red (2200+) rating towards the end of the year 2015. Once we reach there, our objective would change to something else.

This blog is for everyone to post whatever they like; the only restriction is perhaps that it has to be related to competitive coding, but even that can probably be relaxed :)

Although they are not part of this group, there are few seasoned red coders (either here or TopCoder) who are going to help us with this quest: paladin8, lewin, TomConerly, rpeng, and few others. These coaches have agreed to answer questions that I have whenever; if I cannot answer the question directly, I will make sure to get it answered by asking one of them. Hence, you can be assured that your questions would be answered one way or another :)

In particular, it would be a venue for:

1) Personal Editorial: TopCoder SRM, CodeForces Round, CodeChef Long Contest, USACO/COCI, etc. If you guys would like to also write an entry, we can probably either take turns OR we can probably write one jointly

2) Q/A: If you get stuck on a certain problem and would like to get it answered, etc.

3) Tutorial: topics that are confusing that you would like to go over, topics that you already know but there are tricky cases to consider, etc.

4) Contest Updates: to warn group members about the upcoming contest.

5) Many others!

I will be checking this quite frequently so especially if you are asking questions, you should be expecting the reply back within a half day (12 hours). If I cannot answer the questions directly, I will ask the aforementioned coach(es).

Thanks!

yongwhan
